titles.title: Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny any deduction for advertising health insurance.
Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for advertising and other expenses to promote the sale of any insurance which constitutes medical care (health insurance).
